offences.offenceTitle: Attempt theft from the person of another
offences.offenceSummary: On 05/09/2016 at Edinburgh attempted to steal WASHING MACHINE to the value of 750.00, belonging to Flores Howell.
offences.act: Contrary to section 1(1) of the Criminal Attempts Act 1981.

offences.offenceSummary: On 01/01/2015 at Zaya, Bangor, stole LAPTOP to the value of £987.00, belonging to Humphrey England.
offences.act: Contrary to section 1(1) and 7 of the Theft Act 1968.
